body.p: The 2010 Exposure Draft also included detailed proposals on the measurement of the lessee’s lease liability and the lessor’s lease receivable. Of particular note was its proposal that in estimating the lease payments, a lessee should:

li.p: assume the longest possible term that was more likely than not to occur, taking into account any options to extend or terminate the lease; and
include an estimate of variable lease payments, if those payments could be measured reliably.
